definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
to make a bad move (in a game of chess)
kids' game involving throwing and grabbing
lit. to go on a long detour/fig. to speak vaguely around the topic without getting to the point/to beat about the bush
dead bullet (one that does not fire)/a bad move (in a game of chess)

sentences.english: You know that your wife and children come first .
sentences.chinese: 你要知道首先要考虑的是你的妻子儿女。

sentences.english: Then I lay down again, feeling the cobbles harder than ever against my chest.
sentences.chinese: 然后再趴下，胸前石子儿的硬度更胜从前。

sentences.english: These flowers have gone to seed.
Where I come from, if we see a pigeon, we throw a stone at it.
sentences.chinese: 在我的家乡，如果我们看见鸽子，就会拿石子儿丢它。

sentences.english: It was his destiny never to see his wife or children again.
sentences.chinese: 他命中注定再也见不到他的妻子儿女了。

sentences.english: He was kind with his wife and children.
Worldly Wiseman :Have you a wife and children?
He needs more money to keep his wife and children.
sentences.chinese: 他需要更多的钱来抚养妻子儿女。

sentences.english: She has an oval face and is very tall, which makes her a beautiful girl.
sentences.chinese: 瓜子儿脸，高个头，是个挺漂亮的姑娘。

sentences.english: I tried to stone a cat but she jumped on my back.
sentences.chinese: 我曾试图用石头子儿打一只猫，可她跳到了我的背上。

sentences.english: Before you spend a dime, take a look at all the freeware out there.
sentences.chinese: 在你花一个子儿之前，看一看已有的免费软件。

sentences.english: "Here, I'd get shot, " he said of the White House.
sentences.chinese: “我会挨枪子儿，”他说在白宫的话。

sentences.english: You can go sightseeing without paying any money by yourself!
sentences.chinese: 你不消破钞本身一个子儿便可以旅游不雅光。

sentences.english: The boy, not echoing, only kicks small pebbles with his tiptoes, here and there.
sentences.chinese: 男孩子用脚尖踢着地上的小石子儿，没有回答。

sentences.english: Why was Mr. Thomas's son, here, shot in a gambling house?
sentences.chinese: 为什么在座的托马斯先生的儿子在赌场上吃了枪子儿？

sentences.english: Children of father mother wife runs will send, dust flies upwards not to see Xian Yangqiao.
sentences.chinese: 爷娘妻子儿女奔跑来相送，尘埃飞扬不见咸阳桥。

definition: baby/small child/(arch.) slave among ethnic minorities
one Jiao coin (Mao, one-tenth of yuan)
kids' game involving throwing and grabbing
wooden club (used to beat clothes in washing)
to choose/to pick/to sort out/to pick up
